articles.author: Christopher White
articles.title: Papal front-runner: Once on the outs, American Cardinal Tobin now a contender - National Catholic Reporter
articles.description: Cardinal Joseph Tobin's ecclesial resume was built predominantly outside of the U.S., which might ease concerns about an Americentric papacy. And cardinal electors might be attracted to his story of Vatican exile.
articles.content:
There has been little appetite historically among the College of Cardinals for the idea of a pope from the United States, a global superpower. But this conclave could be different.
Two possible papa… [+7770 chars]

articles.title: Measles – Region of the Americas - World Health Organization (WHO)
articles.description: As of 18 April 2025, a total of 2318 measles cases, including three deaths, have been confirmed in six countries in the WHO Region of the Americas, an 11-fold increase compared to the same period in 2024. The majority of cases have occurred among people betwe…
